An Array of names from the ConvertersHash and/or lambdas that handle custom conversion. A single converter doesn't have to be in an Array. All built-in converters try to transcode fields to UTF-8 before converting. The conversion will fail if the data cannot be transcoded, leaving the field unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Array 从名称的 Converters Hash 和/或lambda表达式是处理自定义转换。单个转换器不必位于 Array 中。所有内置转换器都尝试在转换之前将字段转码为UTF-8。如果无法对数据进行转码，则转换将失败，从而使字段保持不变。

An ERB object works by building a chunk of Ruby code that will output the completed template when run.

An ERB object works by building a chunk of Ruby code that will output the completed template when run. If safe_level is set to a non-nil value, ERB code will be run in a separate thread with $SAFE set to the provided level.

trans-unit.source: An Exception object carries information about an exception:
An HTTP client API for Ruby.

An IMAP client connects to a server, and then authenticates itself using either authenticate() or login(). Having authenticated itself, there is a range of commands available to it. Most work with mailboxes, which may be arranged in an hierarchical namespace, and each of which contains zero or more messages. How this is implemented on the server is implementation-dependent; on a UNIX server, it will frequently be implemented as files in mailbox format within a hierarchy of directories.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IMAP 客户端连接到服务器，然后使用任一认证其自身 authenticate() 或 login() 。进行身份验证后，可以使用一系列命令。大多数使用邮箱，邮箱可以安排在分层名称空间中，每个邮箱包含零个或多个消息。在服务器上如何实现这取决于实现；在UNIX服务器上，通常将其实现为目录层次结构中邮箱格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: An OpenStruct is a data structure, similar to a Hash, that allows the definition of arbitrary attributes with their accompanying values. This is accomplished by using Ruby's metaprogramming to define methods on the class itself.

An object in a remote process is locally represented by a DRb::DRbObject instance. This acts as a sort of proxy for the remote object. Methods called upon this DRbObject instance are forwarded to its remote object. This is arranged dynamically at run time. There are no statically declared interfaces for remote objects, such as CORBA's IDL.

trans-unit.source: Any type of object can be passed as an argument to a dRuby call or returned as its return value. By default, such objects are dumped or marshalled at the local end, then loaded or unmarshalled at the remote end. The remote end therefore receives a copy of the local object, not a distributed reference to it; methods invoked upon this copy are executed entirely in the remote process, not passed on to the local original. This has semantics similar to pass-by-value.
trans-unit.target: 任何类型的对象都可以作为dRuby调用的参数传递给dRuby,或者作为其返回值返回。默认情况下,这些对象在本地端被转储或marshall,然后在远程端被加载或取消marshall。因此,远程端收到的是本地对象的副本,而不是对它的分布式引用;在这个副本上调用的方法完全是在远程进程中执行的,而不是传递给本地原始对象。这与逐值传递的语义类似。

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric algorithms offer a lot of nice features that are used in a lot of different areas. A very common application is the creation and validation of digital signatures. To sign a document, the signatory generally uses a message digest algorithm (cf. OpenSSL::Digest) to compute a digest of the document that is then encrypted (i.e. signed) using the private key. Anyone in possession of the public key may then verify the signature by computing the message digest of the original document on their own, decrypting the signature using the signatory's public key and comparing the result to the message digest they previously computed. The signature is valid if and only if the decrypted signature is equal to this message digest.
trans-unit.target: 非对称算法提供了许多用于许多不同领域的出色功能。一个非常常见的应用是数字签名的创建和验证。为了对文档进行签名，签名人通常使用消息摘要算法（请参阅 OpenSSL::Digest ）来计算文档的摘要，然后使用私钥对其进行加密（即签名）。然后，拥有公钥的任何人都可以通过自己计算原始文档的消息摘要，使用签名者的公钥解密签名并将结果与​​他们先前计算的消息摘要进行比较来验证签名。当且仅当解密的签名等于此消息摘要时，该签名才有效。

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric public key algorithms solve the problem of establishing and sharing secret keys to en-/decrypt messages. The key in such an algorithm consists of two parts: a public key that may be distributed to others and a private key that needs to remain secret.
trans-unit.target: 非对称公钥算法解决了建立和共享秘密密钥以加密/解密信息的问题。这种算法中的钥匙由两部分组成:可向他人分发的公用钥匙和需要保密的私人钥匙。

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric public/private key encryption is slow and victim to attack in cases where it is used without padding or directly to encrypt larger chunks of data. Typical use cases for RSA encryption involve “wrapping” a symmetric key with the public key of the recipient who would “unwrap” that symmetric key again using their private key. The following illustrates a simplified example of such a key transport scheme. It shouldn't be used in practice, though, standardized protocols should always be preferred.
trans-unit.target: 非对称的公/私钥加密速度很慢，在不使用填充或直接加密较大数据块的情况下，很容易受到攻击。RSA加密的典型用例包括将对称密钥与接收者的公钥“包装”在一起，后者将使用其私钥再次“解开”该对称密钥。下面示出了这种密钥传输方案的简化示例。尽管不应该在实践中使用它，但始终应首选标准化协议。

At first, tries to create a new URI::Generic instance using URI::Generic::build. But, if exception URI::InvalidComponentError is raised, then it does URI::Escape.escape all URI components and tries again.

trans-unit.source: At the end of the block, changes are committed to the data store automatically. You may exit the transaction early with a call to either PStore#commit or PStore#abort. trans-unit.target: 在该块的末尾，更改将自动提交到数据存储。您可以通过调用 PStore#commit 或 PStore#abort 提前退出交易。有关如何处理更改的详细信息，请参见那些方法。在块中引发未捕获的 Exception 等效于调用 PStore#abort 。

trans-unit.source: Base value used in internal calculations. On a 32 bit system, BASE is 10000, indicating that calculation is done in groups of 4 digits. trans-unit.source: Based on this fact, this method only understands the time zone abbreviations described in RFC 822 and the system time zone, in the order named. (i.e. a definition in RFC 822 overrides the system time zone definition.) The system time zone is taken from Time.local(year, 1, 1).zone and Time.local(year, 7, 1).zone. If the extracted time zone abbreviation does not match any of them, it is ignored and the given time is regarded as a local time.
trans-unit.target: 基于此事实，此方法仅按命名顺序理解RFC 822中描述的时区缩写和系统时区。（即RFC 822中的定义会覆盖系统时区定义。）系统时区来自 Time.local(year, 1, 1).zone 和 Time.local(year, 7, 1).zone 。如果提取的时区缩写与它们中的任何一个都不匹配，则将其忽略并将给定时间视为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Because the IMAP class uses Sockets for communication, its methods are also susceptible to the various errors that can occur when working with sockets. These are generally represented as Errno errors. For instance, any method that involves sending a request to the server and/or receiving a response from it could raise an Errno::EPIPE error if the network connection unexpectedly goes down. See the socket(7), ip(7), tcp(7), socket(2), connect(2), and associated man pages.
trans-unit.target: 由于 IMAP 类使用套接字进行通信，因此其方法也容易受到使用套接字时可能发生的各种错误的影响。这些通常表示为 Errno 错误。例如，如果网络连接意外断开，则涉及向服务器发送请求和/或从服务器接收响应的任何方法都可能引发Errno :: EPIPE错误。请参见socket（7），ip（7），tcp（7），socket（2），connect（2）和相关的手册页。

trans-unit.source: Builds a set of characters from the other_str parameter(s) using the procedure described for String#count. Returns a new string where runs of the same character that occur in this set are replaced by a single character. If no arguments are given, all runs of identical characters are replaced by a single character.

If no arguments are given, all runs of identical characters are replaced by a single character.
trans-unit.target: 使用针对 String#count 所述的过程，从other_str参数构建一组字符。返回一个新字符串，该字符串中出现的相同字符的运行被单个字符替换。如果未提供任何参数，则所有相同字符的运行都将替换为一个字符。

Bundler::Thor has a special class called Bundler::Thor::Group. The main difference to Bundler::Thor class is that it invokes all commands at once. It also include some methods that allows invocations to be done at the class method, which are not available to Bundler::Thor commands.
trans-unit.target: Bundler :: Thor具有一个称为 Bundler::Thor::Group 的特殊类。与Bundler :: Thor类的主要区别在于，它可以一次调用所有命令。它还包括一些允许在类方法处进行调用的方法，而这些方法对于Bundler :: Thor命令不可用。

trans-unit.source: Bundler::Thor methods that should not be overwritten by the user.
trans-unit.target: Bundler::Thor 不应被用户覆盖的方法。

trans-unit.source: Bundler::Thor::Error is raised when it's caused by wrong usage of thor classes. Those errors have their backtrace suppressed and are nicely shown to the user.

But http_proxy and HTTP_PROXY is treated specially under CGI environment. It's because HTTP_PROXY may be set by Proxy: header. So HTTP_PROXY is not used. http_proxy is not used too if the variable is case insensitive. CGI_HTTP_PROXY can be used instead.

trans-unit.target: 但是http_proxy和HTTP_PROXY在 CGI 环境下被特殊对待。这是因为HTTP_PROXY可以通过Proxy：标头设置。因此不使用HTTP_PROXY。如果变量不区分大小写，则也不会使用http_proxy。可以代替使用CGI_HTTP_PROXY。

trans-unit.source: By default Singleton's #_dump(depth) returns the empty string. Marshalling by default will strip state information, e.g. instance variables and taint state, from the instance. Classes using Singleton can provide custom _load(str) and _dump(depth) methods to retain some of the previous state of the instance.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Singleton的#_dump（depth）返回空字符串。默认情况下，编组将从实例中剥离状态信息，例如实例变量和异味状态。使用 Singleton 的类可以提供自定义_load（str）和_dump（depth）方法，以保留实例的某些先前状态。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，假定行用 $/ 分隔。要使用其他字符作为分隔符，请将其作为 String 提供给sep参数。

trans-unit.source: By default non-idempotent requests will not be retried per RFC 2616. By setting retry_change_requests to true requests will automatically be retried once.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不会根据RFC 2616重试非幂等请求。通过将 retry_change_requests 设置为true，将自动重试一次请求。

trans-unit.source: By default the TCP_NODELAY option is set on sockets.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,套接字的TCP_NODELAY选项被设置为。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， Syslog::Logger 使用程序名称“ ruby​​”，但是可以通过 Syslog::Logger.new 的第一个参数来更改它。

trans-unit.source: By default, a command invokes a method in the thor class. You can change this implementation to create custom commands.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,一个命令会调用thor类中的一个方法。你可以改变这个实现来创建自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: By default, a method returns the last expression that was evaluated in the body of the method. In the example above, the last (and only) expression evaluated was the simple sum 1 + 1. The return keyword can be used to make it explicit that a method returns a value.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，方法返回在该方法主体中求值的最后一个表达式。在上面的示例中，最后一个（也是唯一一个）表达式是简单的总和 1 + 1 。该 return 关键字可以被用来制造它明确一个方法返回一个值。

trans-unit.source: By default, do not retain any state when marshalling.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,集结时不保留任何状态。

trans-unit.source: By default, file integrity is only ensured as long as the operating system (and the underlying hardware) doesn't raise any unexpected I/O errors. If an I/O error occurs while PStore is writing to its file, then the file will become corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，仅在操作系统（和基础硬件）不会引发任何意外的I / O错误的情况下，才能确保文件完整性。如果 PStore 写入其文件时发生I / O错误，则该文件将损坏。

trans-unit.source: By default, strict is false, meaning every available version of a gem is returned from sort_versions. The order gives preference to the requested level (:patch, :minor, :major) but in complicated requirement cases some gems will by necessity by promoted past the requested level, or even reverted to older versions.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,strict为false,这意味着一个宝石的每个可用版本都会从sort_versions中返回。这个顺序优先考虑所要求的级别(:patch,:minor,:major),但是在复杂的需求情况下,有些宝石会被提升到所要求的级别以上,甚至恢复到旧版本。

trans-unit.source: By default, the first and second form raise Encoding::UndefinedConversionError for characters that are undefined in the destination encoding, and Encoding::InvalidByteSequenceError for invalid byte sequences in the source encoding. The last form by default does not raise exceptions but uses replacement strings.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，第一种形式和第二种形式针对目标编码中 Encoding::UndefinedConversionError 的字符引发Encoding :: UndefinedConversionError，对于源编码中的无效字节序列 Encoding::InvalidByteSequenceError 。默认情况下，最后一种形式不引发异常，但使用替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: By default, the returned pathnames will have enough information to access the files. If you set with_directory to false, then the returned pathnames will contain the filename only.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，返回的路径名将具有足够的信息来访问文件。如果将 with_directory 设置为 false ，则返回的路径名将仅包含文件名。
